level.heading: Proposal to name or rename to be submitted to affected property owners.
level.text: The person or persons who initiate a proposal to name or rename a street or alley in the District of Columbia shall submit in writing a copy of the proposal to each owner of property abutting the affected street or alley.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-201
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-201, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 9-201.01.
